name: askgovsg
description: Ask.gov.sg - Official Answers from the Singapore Government

scripts.build: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.postinstall: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
scripts.auditDep: npm audit fix && npm --prefix server audit fix && npm --client server audit fix
scripts.test: npm --prefix server test && CI=true npm --prefix client test -- --passWithNoTests
scripts.lint: npm run --prefix server lint && npm run --prefix client lint
scripts.lint-ci: npm run --prefix server lint-ci && npm run --prefix client lint-ci

author: Open Government Products, GovTech Singapore (https://open.gov.sg)
